itemDescription: Scottish fantasy fiction e science fiction author

wikipedia_page.main: Anthony Ryan is a Scottish writer of fantasy and science fiction, best known for his books about Vaelin Al Sorna, which started in 2013 with Blood Song. He worked as a full-time researcher before switching to full-time writing. He currently lives in London, England. He has a degree in Medieval History.

response: * Anthony Ryan, author of the Raven's Shadow series
* Anthony Ryan's Raven's Shadow, an ongoing series.http://www.bestfantasybookshq.com/hqs-top-10-must-reads/
